LightningComponentBundle.description: Data table component allowing single/multi-select, and filter possibility

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Input Type
propertyType.description: Generic sObject data type used for input sObject properties

property.name: in_records
property.label: 1. Records to display
property.description: Collection of SObjects which should be shown

property.name: in_displayFieldsString
property.label: 2. Display Fields
property.description: Comma separated values of API Field names which should be shown as columns

property.name: in_selectionMax
property.label: 3. Maximum number of records to select
property.description: 0 will hide checkboxes, 1 will show a radio, 2 or more will allow that number, fill 999 for no limit

property.name: in_selectionMin
property.label: 4. Minimum number of records to select
property.description: Opt. value to require a minimum number of selections

property.name: in_displayLabelsString
property.label: 5. Display Labels
property.description: Opt. comma separated value of Labels to display in columns instead of API field names; note, ignored when not matching same number of columns of Display Fields

property.name: in_filterFieldsString
property.label: 6. Filter Fields
property.description: Comma separated values of API Field names which should be possible to filter. When left empty, no filter input is shown

property.name: in_initialNumRecords
property.label: 7. Number of records to display
property.description: To allow fast rendering, the number of records should be restricted. This is the number of records shown after initial load and the number of records added after each scroll

property.name: filter
property.label: in/out Filter string
property.description: String used to filter records. When storing the output, and providing that as input, a Next-Previous interaction goes super smooth. Or one can prefill a filter

property.name: selectedRecord
property.label: in/out Selected Single Record
property.description: Single SObject record which was selected, ONLY for in_selectionType == 1

property.name: selectedRecordList
property.label: in/out Selected Record Collection
property.description: Collection of SObjects which were selected
